sentences.sContent: Another way to prevent prostate disease is through diet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another way to prevent prostate disease is through diet.
sentences.sCn: 预防前列腺疾病的另一种方法是饮食。

sentences.sContent: A normal prostate is the size of a walnut, but the condition can increase this to the size of a tangerine.
sentences.sContent_eng: A normal prostate is the size of a walnut, but the condition can increase this to the size of a tangerine.
sentences.sCn: 一个正常的前列腺是胡桃大小，但是这种疾病能使其增大到柑橘大小。

sentences.sContent: It is normal if the woman feels like she needs to urinate, as the prostate tissue surrounds the urethra, the tube through which urine leaves the bladder.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is normal if the woman feels like she needs to urinate, as the prostate tissue surrounds the urethra, the tube through which urine leaves the bladder.
sentences.sCn: 如果她感觉好像要小便，那么这是很正常的，因为前列腺组织包裹着尿道，就是将尿从膀胱里排出的管子。

words.tran: [泌尿] 前列腺炎，摄护腺炎

trans.tranOther: an organ in the body of male  mammal s  that is near the  bladder  and that produces a liquid in which  sperm  are carried
